snippet: Exquisite sensitivities surround every detail in the creation of the National September 11 Memorial Museum, which is being built on land that many revere as hallowed ground.
abstract: Planning and construction of the National September 11 Memorial Museum at ground zero in New York City has been hobbled by contention and the demanding sensitivities of those most deeply affected by the attacks; controversies have centered on such basic issues as whether or not to include photographs of the hijackers.
lead_paragraph: Exquisite sensitivities surround every detail in the creation of the National September 11 Memorial Museum, which is being built on land that many revere as hallowed ground.

headline.seo: Sept. 11 Memorial Museum’s Fraught Task: To Tell the Truth.
headline.main: At Museum on 9/11, Talking Through an Identity Crisis
headline.print_headline: At 9/11 Museum, Talking Through an Identity Crisis
